body_html:
Another problem：
I am not sure whether someone has tried SyncReplicasOptimizer + MonitoredTrainingSession + Placeholder of Model Input. After session created, during initializing variables in the hook function, it reports needing to feed value to the placeholder. I am confused what triggered off the network computing before session.run calling explicitly. Finally I change to use placeholder_with_default with a default value to work around this question. But I think it's not a good idea.
Little information can be found in the doc.

body:
Another problem：
I am not sure whether someone has tried SyncReplicasOptimizer +  MonitoredTrainingSession + Placeholder of Model Input. After session created, during initializing variables in the hook function, it reports needing to feed value to the placeholder. I am confused what triggered off the network computing before session.run calling explicitly. Finally I change to use placeholder_with_default with a default value to work around this question. But I think it's not a good idea. 
Little information can be found in the doc.
